name: Surfswap
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Surfswap is a decentralized exchange (DEX) with an automated market maker (AMM), providing liquidity and peer-to-peer transactions. The all-in-one Defi solution provides an array of services and features supporting the DeFi and Web3 spaces, including crypto swaps, staking, and yield farming, and serves as a launch platform for new and exciting projects to build on the Kava Network.
